NAME: Somnath Chatterjee
ABOUT:
Partner at McKinsey & Company
Co leading Digital McKinsey in India 
Somnath leverages deep expertise in digital to advise a broad range of companies in the technology sector—including service providers, software-product companies, and offshore-product-development (OPD) companies—on growth, digital strategy, and organization transformation. He has also led sales acceleration and at-scale delivery-modernization efforts with leading technology companies.

Specialties: Strategy , Service Operations , Lean , Growth, M&A and diligence, Technology
